      • getChanges

        io.reactivex.Single<de.wirecard.epos.model.inventory.ProductChanges> getChanges(java.lang.String catalogueId,
                                                                                org.threeten.bp.OffsetDateTime dateTime,
                                                                                de.wirecard.epos.model.inventory.ChangesFilter filter)
        Find changes for catalogue with given catalogue ID. Return ProductChanges which contains lists of all added/modified/deleted products.
        Parameters:
        catalogueId - ID of catalogue which is searched for product changes
        dateTime - from which date changes should be shown
        filter - pagination filter (page, size, order)

                                       java.lang.String productId,
                                       java.lang.String version)
        Delete existing product from inventory.
        Parameters:
        catalogueId - id of parent product catalogue
        productId - id of product to remove
        version - version of product to remove

        indication for completion or exception

      • deleteProductCatalogue

        io.reactivex.Completable deleteProductCatalogue(java.lang.String catalogueId,
                                                java.lang.String version)
        Delete existing product catalogue from inventory. Content of product catalogue will be removed too.
        Parameters:
        catalogueId - id of product catalogue to remove
        version - version of product catalogue to remove
        Returns:
        indication for completion or exception

        categoryId - id of product category to remove
